H0.text: Who wrote The Sea Wolf. Robert Louis Stevenson

H1.text: Who wrote The Sea Wolf. Edgar Allan Poe

H2.text: Who wrote The Sea Wolf. Mark Twain

H3.text: Who wrote The Sea Wolf. GBLON

A4.text: London based his protagonist Wolf Larsen, in the novel The Sea-Wolf, on McLean.

A5.text: London's most famous novels are The Call of the Wild, White Fang, The Sea-Wolf, The Iron Heel, and Martin Eden.
